path /v3/ada/transaction

sum send ada to cardano addresses
reqBody
oneof

required
to
fromaddress
fee
changeaddress
props
fromaddress
desc the array of blockchain addresses to send the assets from and their private keys for each address the last 100 transactions are scanned for any utxo to be included in the transaction

items
type object
required
address
privatekey
props
address
desc the blockchain address to send the assets from
type string
minimum 30
maximum 128

desc the private key of the address to send the assets from
type string
minimum 52
maximum 128
to
desc the array of blockchain addresses to send the assets to and the amounts that each address should receive in ada the difference between the utxos calculated in the fromaddress section and the total amount to receive calculated in the to section will be used as the gas fee to explicitly specify the fee amount and the blockchain address where any extra funds remaining after covering the fee will be sent set the fee and changeaddress parameters

path /v3/ada/broadcast
opid adabroadcast
params None
sum broadcast signed ada transaction
reqBody
schema broadcastkms
props
txdata
desc raw signed transaction to be published to network
maxlength 500000
minlength 1
type string
signatureid
desc id of prepared payment template to sign required only when broadcasting transaction signed by tatum kms
format uuid
type string
index
desc only if the signature id is mnemonicbased and you run kms v62 or later the index of the address to send the assets from that was generated from the mnemonic
type number
minimum 0
maximum 2147483647
required
txdata
type object
